CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 22, 1952, pg. 12, reads: "YWCA is Presented New Bible - Members of the World Fellowship Committee presented a copy of the newly translated and revised version of the Bible to the YWCA. Dr. C. A. Burrell, right, is pictured giving a copy of the new Bible to Mrs. Mildred Young, branch executive, in a special ceremony.  Others in picture, are left to right: Mrs. Grace McCray, Miss E. Marie Coleman, Mrs. Odessa Bussey, Mrs. Willa Mae Rice, Mrs. Charles Pernell, Dr. Burrell, Mrs. Alma A. Polk, Mrs. Sallie Morris, and Mrs. Rodney Pryor. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Dr. C. A. Burrell presenting bible to Mildred Young, surrounded by Grace McCray, E. Marie Coleman, Odessa Bussey, Willa Mae Rice, Mrs. Charles Pernell, Alma A. Polk, Sallie Morris, and Mrs. Rodney Pryor, in Centre Avenue branch of YWCA
